item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Apps like Blackbird are paving the way for a decentralized internet, where users do everything they can in web2, but better and onchain.
It‚Äôs been a blast helping the team bring this vision to life.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Apps like Blackbird are paving the way for a decentralized internet, where users do everything they can in web2, but better and onchain.

It‚Äôs been a blast helping the team bring this vision to life.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: All Blackbird check-ins happen onchain. Flynet processes users‚Äô activity and rewards them in $FLY, which can be used to pay at Blackbird restaurants, just like cash ü§Ø
Blackbird has serious traction too, with over 57,000 addresses holding a membership NFT.

item.title: R to @conduitxyz: Blackbird doesn‚Äôt feel like a crypto app. It feels like a cutting edge restaurant app. But the crypto stuff happening under the hood gives users unique benefits they can‚Äôt get in web2.

item.title:
The @blackbird_xyz Flynet is now live.
Built with @arbitrum and settling on @base with onboarding by @privy_io, Flynet powers Blackbird: the only restaurant loyalty app that pays you to eat.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:

item.title:

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Nucleus incentivizes more users to try your rollup with native yield.
Integrate @nucleusearn and remove the opportunity cost of exploring your chain.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Immunefi is crypto‚Äôs biggest bug bounty platform.
Keep your chain safe by joining @immunefi and giving white hat hackers incentives to find vulnerabilities ‚Äì before bad guys do. Immunefi protects $190B in TVL and has paid out over $100M in bounties.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Immunefi is crypto‚Äôs biggest bug bounty platform.

Keep your chain safe by joining @immunefi and giving white hat hackers incentives to find vulnerabilities ‚Äì before bad guys do. Immunefi protects $190B in TVL and has paid out over $100M in bounties.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Stork puts lightning fast price feeds on your rollup.
With @StorkOracle, prices update within 10 milliseconds of real time, enabling ultra low-latency DeFi use cases. Stork covers spot prices, perp futures, volatility metrics, and more.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Stork puts lightning fast price feeds on your rollup.

With @StorkOracle, prices update within 10 milliseconds of real time, enabling ultra low-latency DeFi use cases. Stork covers spot prices, perp futures, volatility metrics, and more.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Sentio is the developer platform that helps onchain builders use data better.
@sentioxyz gives devs custom indexers, dedicated databases, instant APIs, intelligent debuggers, and more so they can build faster on your chain.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Sentio is the developer platform that helps onchain builders use data better.

@sentioxyz gives devs custom indexers, dedicated databases, instant APIs, intelligent debuggers, and more so they can build faster on your chain.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Sablier provides infra for onchain token distribution.
Teams can use @Sablier to manage payroll onchain, set auto-executing token vesting schedules, airdrop tokens to their communities, and more.
Sablier makes bulk token sending easy.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Sablier provides infra for onchain token distribution.

Teams can use @Sablier to manage payroll onchain, set auto-executing token vesting schedules, airdrop tokens to their communities, and more.

Sablier makes bulk token sending easy.
